fields.name: Flood
fields.short_description: Advanced Disaster Risk Reduction (DRR) in case of floods.
fields.long_description: To prevent floods in Europe, it is essential to implement a combination of sustainable land management practices, such as reforestation and wetland restoration; invest in advanced flood defense infrastructure like levees, retention basins, and green urban spaces.

fields.name: Forest Fire
fields.short_description: Forest Fire Digital learning for vulnerability analysis in cases of forest fires.
fields.long_description: Preventing forest fires requires proactive measures like maintaining firebreaks, promoting sustainable land management, enforcing strict regulations against illegal burning, educating communities on fire safety, and using advanced monitoring systems for early detection and rapid response.

fields.name: Heat Wave
fields.short_description: Learn about advanced community resilience and recovery strategies in case of heat waves.
fields.long_description: To mitigate heat waves, prioritize urban cooling strategies like green roofs and shaded areas, improve public access to cooling centers, raise awareness about hydration and heat risks, and implement early warning systems to protect vulnerable populations.

fields.name: Storm
fields.short_description: Good emergency preparedness and response reduce negative storm consequences.
fields.long_description: To reduce storm impacts, enhance infrastructure resilience, improve drainage systems, implement early warning systems, promote sustainable land use, and educate communities on emergency preparedness and response measures..
